name: Time.Extra

values.name: everyWhen
values.comment:
Same as the `Time.every` function,
but you can turn it on and off.

values.name: fromFps
values.comment:
Converts a number of ticks per second
into the corresponding interval between to ticks.

values.name: timestamps
values.comment: Extract the timestamps of the updates of the given signal.

values.name: toFps
values.comment: Get the FPS corresponding to a given time between to frames.
